messages.message: Does anyone know if we are using Anaconda (https://www.anaconda.com/)?
I dont think we are using it inside our deployments or jenkins (we are using virtual env there) but we are using it in some of our EC2 instances or local macs for environment handling

long ago, in one of the services we had used conda but that's gone

historically we have been using pypi for package management

we haven't explored any other anaconda product offerings
